name: Hoa
summary: Hoa is a beautiful puzzle-platforming game that features breathtaking hand-painted art, lovely music, and a peaceful, relaxing atmosphere. Experience the magic of nature and imagination as you play the main character, Hoa, on her journey through breathtaking environments back to where it all began.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle platformer
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年4月
  • 官方网站: http://www.hoathegame.com
  • 开发: Skrollcat Studio
  • 发行: PM Studios, inc.
